thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 22 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Time Publishing and Media to sell entire 19.3 pct stake in safety technique firm for 53.2 mln yuan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Time Publishing and Media to sell entire 19.3 pct stake in safety technique firm for 53.2 mln yuan

organizations.name: time publishing and media co ltd
beijing global safety technology co ltd

text:
Jan 22(Reuters) - Time Publishing and Media Co Ltd
* Says it plans to sell entire 19.3 pct stake in Anhui-based safety technique firm for 53.2 million yuan, to Beijing Global Safety Technology Co Ltd
* Says Beijing Global Safety Technology will issue 1.3 million shares to the company for the stake acquisition
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/mJCQus
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
